title: Skin
body: I didnt receive Riot Kayle skin :/ . Maybe because of leaving the game ?

replies.body: As long as you've played a game recently you've been fine. If the only match you played was a leave then I recommend queuing up before the 19th and completing a match.  Gifts are still being handed out so it will take some time, per our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-).  Hang tight!
umm.. well ill say yes ...riot gaming will ban u or punish u for leaving a game u playing ....this is the reason u didn't get that skin u need !! :)
